name: Wokou
startIntroPart1: O, Wang Zhi, our great lord and a great trader! You dominated the Asian sea, with mighty power and great trading power.
declaringWar: All your golds belong to me.
attacked: So... you chose to fight against the power of vast sea.
defeated: The sea remembers me, even if history does not.
neutralHello: Do you want to trade something?
afterPeace: Sometimes, trading is more profitable than fighting.
uniques: Gain a free [Harbor] [in all coastal cities]
Receive [+200]% Gold from Barbarian encampments and pillaging Cities
[+15]% Production when constructing [Water] units [in all cities]
[-15]% Production when constructing [Land] units [in all cities]
